tool_description: Submit a large document and get matching emojis
name: Emoji Tagger
title: Emoji Tagger

api_list.name: en
api_list.description: This v1 endpoint will translate a document into emoji for English document.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emoji-tagger.p.rapidapi.com/en"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emoji-tagger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://emoji-tagger.p.rapidapi.com/en"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emoji-tagger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
